thread.title: H.R. Pufnstuf, child of the '60s, visits Nickelodeon show

author: timesunion.com
title: H.R. Pufnstuf, child of the '60s, visits Nickelodeon show
text:
Photo: Robert Voets, AP Image 1 of / 3   3 This photo provided by Nickelodeon shows Calvin Millan, left, as Calvin, Stuff, and clockwise at top right, Zippy, Grandma, Giggles and Wiggles in season one of "Mutt & Stuff," on Nickelodeon. H.R. Pufnstuf, the title character of the 1969-71 children’s series will appear on an episode of Nickelodeon’s new preschool series “Mutt & Stuff,” the cable channel said Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015.(Robert Voets/Nickelodeon via AP)
Photo: Robert Voets, AP This photo provided by Nickelodeon shows Calvin Millan, left, as... Image 2 of 3 This photo provided by Sid & Marty Krofft Productions and Nickelodeon shows a scene with Cling and Clang driving the Rescue Racer with H.R. Pufnstuf riding in the back from the television series, "H.R. Pufnstuf." The title character of the 1969-71 children’s series will appear on an episode of Nickelodeon’s new preschool series “Mutt & Stuff,” the cable channel said Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015.(Robert Voets/Nickelodeon via AP)
Photo: AP This photo provided by Sid & Marty Krofft Productions and... Image 3 of 3 This photo provided by Nickelodeon shows Marty Krofft. H.R. Pufnstuf, the title character of the 1969-71 children’s series will appear on an episode of Nickelodeon’s new preschool series “Mutt & Stuff,” the cable channel said Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015. “Mutt & Stuff” is produced by Sid and Marty Krofft, the same brothers who produced “H.R. Pufnstuf.” (Robert Voets/Nickelodeon via AP)
Photo: Robert Voets, AP This photo provided by Nickelodeon shows Marty Krofft. H.R.... H.R. Pufnstuf, child of the '60s, visits Nickelodeon show 1  /  3 Back to Gallery LOS ANGELES (AP) — H.R. Pufnstuf is coming back to television, and he's bringing a few old pals along with him.
The title character of the 1969-71 children's series will appear on an episode of Nickelodeon 's new preschool series "Mutt & Stuff," the cable channel said Tuesday.
Pufnstuf will be joined by Freddy the Flute and Cling and Clang on a "Mutt & Stuff" episode taping next month. It's scheduled to air in early 2016.
"Mutt & Stuff" is produced by Sid and Marty Krofft , the same brothers who produced "H.R. Pufnstuf." That show is still in reruns more than four decades after it debuted.
